publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-628 Michael Matheson: End Discrimination by Utilitiesâ€”That the Parliament notes the continuation of the practice by utility companies of surcharging those who do not pay by direct debit; believes that this surcharge is a tax on older people and those with low incomes, and calls on these companies to introduce a system that does not discriminate against those who choose to pay by cash.

S3M-628 End Discrimination by Utilities (lodged on 5 October 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Christine Grahame*, Liam McArthur*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bob Doris*, John Park*, Keith Brown*, Bill Kidd*, Bill Wilson*, Rob Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Angela Constance*, Elaine Smith*, Sandra White*, Ken Macintosh*, Jackie Baillie*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-628 End Discrimination by Utilities (lodged on 5 October 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-628 End Discrimination by Utilities (lodged on 5 October 2007) Gil Paterson*
S3M-628 End Discrimination by Utilities (lodged on 5 October 2007) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-628 End Discrimination by Utilities (lodged on 5 October 2007) Kenneth Gibson*
